name: Vans Unisex-Child Brooklyn Ls V Low Top Shoe
product_description: Keep your little ones comfortable and stylish with the Vans Toddler Brooklyn LS V Shoes. Designed for both first steps and playground adventures, these everyday toddler dress sneakers feature the Sidestripe, suede and canvas uppers, and decorative stitching for a cute, comfortable look with any outfit. The dual hook-and-loop closure makes these baby walking shoes easy to put on and take off, while the padded tongue and collar provide all-day comfort. A vulcanized rubber waffle outsole adds extra grip for indoor and outdoor play, ensuring their footwear keeps up with their adventures. Since 1966, Vans has inspired kids to explore, create, and have fun – because play never goes out of style.
